resources.string:
Welcome!
Open the side drawer to explore the courses
 UIUC: 6 courses (18 credit hours)
 •1 course must be a western cultural studies (WCC)
 •1 course must be a non-Western(NW)
 •1 course must be a U.S. minority cultural studies (US)
 •2 of the 6 courses must be a humanity(LA)
 •2 of the 6 courses must a social science (SS)
 •The remaining 2 courses can be from any combination of (LA or SS)

 NOTE: UIUC has a foreign language requirement for the Bachelor's degree. You must complete third course in a sequence. This can be completed either in high school at, College of DuPage, or at UIUC. The foreign language courses do not count as credits for either the AES or the BS degrees.
Disclaimer: All of these guides are unofficial and are just made to a helpful resource.\n\n All data was pulled from Transferology and College of DuPage\'s website.
